question:
List the names of all the cards in the set Hour of Devastation and find the formats in which these cards are legal.
the set Hour of Devastation refers to set.name = 'Hour of Devastation'; names of all the cards in the set refers to cards.name; legal cards refers to status = 'Legal'; the formats refers to format
query: SELECT DISTINCT T2.name, CASE WHEN T1.status = 'Legal' THEN T1.format ELSE NULL END FROM legalities AS T1 INNER JOIN cards AS T2 ON T2.uuid = T1.uuid WHERE T2.setCode IN (SELECT code FROM sets WHERE name = 'Hour of Devastation')
